question:
Which among the following is/ are the objectives of the Promotion of Dairy Entrepreneurship (PDE) program?
1. To promote modern dairy farms
2. Upgrade of technology
3. Generate of self-employment
4. Provide infrastructure to the unorganised sector
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Objectives of Promotion of Dairy Entrepreneurship (PDE) program- To promote modern dairy farms,Â  Upgrade of traditional technology, Generation of self-employment, Provide infrastructure to the unorganised sector, Handling of milk marketing on a commercial scale.
